title: OMG!! My lol kept crashing during the whole game !n
body: Hey guys ! 20 mins before, I started a rank game. It's my first game in bo5 to gold. But I don't know why my game kept crashing since 10min in the game. Is there anyone who met the same thing ? Plz tell me what happened to my pc or my lol client. I need to make sure that my next promotion game will be ok. Thank you guys a lot.

replies.body:
That must be really stressful having that fear of queuing up for a promo match and be worried about crashing out of the game at any moment D: Or I could just be really stressed for you just thinking about that.

I might need some more information as to what's going on in your game when this crash occurs. Do you see an error message pop up? Does the game complete freeze? With some more details, I can provide the right tools so you can test them out in a custom game and then not have to worry about a thing when you queue up for a ranked match :)
